vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
WhaleGiveaway2.redeem (patch_19.sol#9-14) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_19.sol#12)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_19.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_19.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in WhaleGiveaway2.command (patch_19.sol#21-24):
	-require(bool)(_adr.call.value(msg.value)(_data)) patch_19.sol#23

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_adr' of WhaleGiveaway2.command (patch_19.sol#21) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_data' of WhaleGiveaway2.command (patch_19.sol#21) is not in mixedCase
